text: Hi Simon, nice to meet you! :slightly_smiling_face: I'm a 3rd year student from Bournemouth university, and I would like to do animation and rigging in particular. I'm a big fan of BlueZoo and your cartoony style, which is also what I would really like to improve on. I'm excited to get some tips on animation, especially because I've still got a lot of learning to do. :relaxed: Simone

Hi Simone pleased to meet you. Happy to help with anything I can, I'm a big fan of the cartoony stuff too! What have you been doing on your course so far? Is there anything in particular you would like some feedback on?
